Articles.Content: Edited September 21, 2014 by _Augustus_
The general MO here is to use the Add-on Development forum for WIP projects, and only move here when a project is ready for general release.

The general MO here is to use the Add-on Development forum for WIP projects, and only move here when a project is ready for general release.

The THREAD is WIP, I have stuff ready

Wip thread
The THREAD is WIP, I have stuff ready

Cryptic!!!

The THREAD is WIP, I have stuff ready

Erm... why post a thread without stuff? Sort the stuff out, go advanced and preview till you're happy, then post?

No license, ripping off/deriving from someone else's work without attribution as required by a CC license.

Gotta raise an eyebrow at someone who goes into the StarSystems thread, acts incredibly rude to the mod author, then just proceeds to lift and derive their stuff without attribution.
[MOD - I've removed the code and download links from the OP until all parties involved resolve their attribution/licensing issues.]

Okay guys.

Since it didn't go across very well the first time, I'm going to say it again:

If you see something that is not according to the forum rules, be it someone being rude or licensing issues, you report it, and you let the moderation team do it's job, you don't immediately post after telling people what to do, as this turns out to be backseat moderation and isn't allowed either by the rules.

Now, I had to remove a lot of messages from here, and I'd rather not have to do it again.

About the issue itself, this is redistributing absolutely no content at all from either StarSystems or PF, this is simply a bunch of textures and configs, and is not a derivative from either mods. It doesn't need to bend to the share-alike clauses of the licenses, even though attribution should be common sense, so this is good to go, he can have his own licenses if pleases him.

Carry on.

Edited August 8, 2014 by stupid_chris
